summary: Import Anchor prelude types and macros.
Import the System Program CPI helper and Transfer accounts struct.
Declare the program ID for this CPI example.
Mark the module as the program entrypoint.
Define the CPI calls program module.
Bring module items into scope.
Transfer lamports by invoking the System Program via CPI.
Prepare CPI accounts for the system transfer.
Provide the sender account to the CPI.
Provide the recipient account to the CPI.
Close the CPI account struct initialization.
Build the CPI context with the system program.
Invoke the System Program transfer instruction.
Log the transfer result.
Return success from the instruction.
End of the transfer instruction.
End of the program module.
Define the accounts context for transfer.
Declare the TransferLamports accounts struct.
Mark the sender account as mutable.
Sender must sign and pay lamports.
Mark the recipient account as mutable.
Recipient system account for lamports.
System program used for CPI transfer.
End of the TransferLamports accounts struct.
